channel.title: Need help portfowarding
channel.description: Can someone please help me with portfowarding I have no idea what to do and i want to make a server so badly. Thanks :)

item.title: Need help portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

if you port forwart whit u-torrent youll need to open preferences - network or something like that and enter server port, Like 43594 or something close to that…

when you enter your router, add this to your “port forwarding” tab
“service name” - “start port” - “end port” - “local ip”

HTTP 80 80 “local ip”

FTP 21 21 “local ip”

DNS 43594 43594 “local ip”

U-torrent 43595 43595 “local ip”

works for me, im not sure it will work for you thou…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2009, 12:23:57 pm[/size][hr]Make sure you Enable them to. or click the box saying “Enable” or something lol… ;S

Read full topic

item.title: Need help portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

www.PortForward.com

Find your router and use the custom guide for it rather than selecting a game to portforward for.
